Title: A Winter Tale
Writer: Cameron Bailey (idea), Patrick Barrington (additional dialogue), Valerie Buhagiar (additional dialogue), Julie Crooks (idea), Bobby Del Rio (additional dialogue), Shernold Edwards (additional material), Onyekachi Ejim (additional dialogue), Leonie Forbes (additional dialogue), R.O. Plot: Shots ring out one winter night, and a bullet meant for a local dealer kills a child. In the aftermath of shock, Gene, a 40 something social worker starts a Black men's support group, at the local Caribbean Takeaway Restaurant.
